active_learning.discussion_prompt: In a group discussion, debate why semantic security is essential against CPA. Use examples like the ECB penguin vulnerability or historical Caesar cipher breaks to argue if batch CPA suffices or if adaptive CPA is always needed. Reflect on real-world implications for modern systems.
active_learning.peer_teaching: Explain the key concepts to a partner without using technical jargon.
active_learning.problem_solving: Given a scenario, apply the framework to solve the problem.
